decision: Created milestone/M1-recording-teleprompter branch, generated kickoff messages for 7 agents (ENG-LEAD,FE,FE-Dev-2,BEI,PD,QA,PM) covering 6 core tickets (B1-B4,C2-C3) + supporting tasks (telemetry hooks, circuit breaker validation, design), scheduled mid-review 2025-10-27 and exit-review 2025-11-03
